name: rage-candy-bar
effect: May be traded for a tm64 in the vertical Underground Path.
short_effect: HS: Traded for TM64. Gen II & Gen V: Acts as a Potion.

flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A famous candy in Mahogany Town. Many
tourists like to buy them to take home.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists
like to buy and take home. It restores
the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists
like to buy and take home. It restores
the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Mahogany Town’s famous candy.
When consumed, it restores
20 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Mahogany Town’s famous candy. It can be used
once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Mahogany Town’s famous candy. It can be used
once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Mahogany Town’s famous candy. It can be used
once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Mahogany Town’s famous candy. It can be used
once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
